item.title: Accor Plus is the latest paid loyalty program offered by Accor
item.description:
Source: Accor. Accor Advantage Plus, the paid loyalty program from Accor with more than 350,000 members in 17 countries, has been renamed and enhanced. Now known as Accor Plus, this 21-year-old program allows members to enjoy enhanced experiences at over 600 Accor properties in the Asia Pacific region. The company stated that members can benefit from substantial discounts on accommodations, dining at over 800 restaurants, and access to various VIP events and partner offers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-plus-is-the-latest-paid-loyalty-program-offered-by-accor/

item.title: Singapore Airlines and Changi Airport Group have decided to extend the Changi Transit Programme
item.description:
Source: Changi Airport Group. Singapore Airlines (SIA) and Changi Airport Group (CAG) have prolonged their partnership program, offering rewards to SIA and SilkAir passengers traveling through Singapore’s Changi Airport. Until March 31, 2017, passengers with connecting flights on SIA and/or SilkAir at Changi Airport can receive a Changi Dollar Voucher (CDV). The voucher’s value, either S$20 or S$40, depends on the traveler’s origin. Foo Chai Woo, SIA’s Divisional Vice President Sales & Marketing, highlighted the benefit of SIA’s extensive route network combined with Changi Airport’s offerings for global travelers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-airlines-and-changi-airport-group-have-decided-to-extend-the-changi-transit-programme/

item.title: The Global Day of Discovery at Renaissance Hotels worldwide is celebrated on June 26th
item.description:
Renaissance Hotels is hosting its third annual Global Day of Discovery on June 26th at over 150 locations. On this day, almost every hotel will offer guests and community members the opportunity to explore something new. These events, designed by hotel Navigators, include musical performances, culinary experiences, art displays, cultural activities, and unique local excursions. This day marks the start of the Renaissance Hotels’ Summer of Discovery calendar, a summer-long series of exclusive events at all 157 hotels worldwide...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-global-day-of-discovery-at-renaissance-hotels-worldwide-is-celebrated-on-june-26th/

item.title: Australian businesses have the option to utilize uChoose for their corporate rewards program
item.description:
Source: uChoose website. i2c, a company providing card processing and new financial service solutions, partnered with Corporate Prepaid Solutions (CPS), a prepaid program manager, to launch the first of several corporate prepaid programs. This launch features the uChoose corporate rewards gift card in Australia. The uChoose card, enabled by i2c’s global processing platform, is a ready-made solution for companies wanting to provide a Visa-branded gift card. Businesses can personalize the card to match their branding...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/australian-businesses-have-the-option-to-utilize-uchoose-for-their-corporate-rewards-program/
